original_title: Why We Fight: The Battle of China
overview: The sixth film of Frank Capra's Why We Fight propaganda film series illustrates Japan's occupation of China, including Madame Chiang Kai-Shek's stirring address before congress, the rape of Nanking, the great 2,000 mile migration, and Claire Chennault's Flying Tigers.

production_companies.name: War Activities Committee of the Motion Pictures Industry

title: Why We Fight: The Battle of China
